name: Building Connections and Community Beyond the Classroom
description:
Slides from Anu and Fritz's talk - Building Connections and Community Beyond the Classroom - from Config2022


--------


Hear from Anu and Fritz and their journey navigating the design world as BIPOC designers - and what changes they are creating with Inneract Project to foster stronger community and paths for underrepresented folks coming into, and already in, the industry.
